line.comment: * Cancel this task, if stop flag is set
* Cancel this task, if there are no ships left in the associated wing
* Check, if the wing has a formation leader; if not, assign a new leader (should only happen, if leader gets killed)

line.text: '%sTarget: %s Wing %s has following wing ships: %s Bomber: %s'

line.comment: * Get position of leader, if leader is more than 10 km away from target and OOS
* If target is in another sector, and wing leader is not on his way to target sector, start wing move (or jump) to target sector
* Stop moving or jumping, if target is in same sector as ship (if e.g. target is in adjacent sector, and while THIS is prepairing for jump, target enters SECTOR)
* Correct bug of follower ships not catching up with leader in OOS sectors while moving in formation (follower ships only)
* Skip any further checks, if we are currently moving to another sector
* Asure, that ships in wing follow leader

sval.val: %sTarget: %s Wing %s has following wing ships: %s Bomber: %s
Cancel this task, if stop flag is set
Cancel this task, if there are no ships left in the associated wing
Check, if the wing has a formation leader; if not, assign a new leader (should only happen, if leader gets killed)
Get position of leader, if leader is more than 10 km away from target and OOS
If target is in another sector, and wing leader is not on his way to target sector, start wing move (or jump) to target sector
Stop moving or jumping, if target is in same sector as ship (if e.g. target is in adjacent sector, and while THIS is prepairing for jump, target enters SECTOR)
Correct bug of follower ships not catching up with leader in OOS sectors while moving in formation (follower ships only)
Skip any further checks, if we are currently moving to another sector
Asure, that ships in wing follow leader
